title: Slow cooker steak and ale pie
ingredients: ['2 large carrots, peeled and cut into chunks', '3 potatoes, peeled and cut into large chunks', '1 onion, roughly chopped', '1.5kg braising steak, cut into chunks', '1 tablespoon flour', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon mixed herbs', 'oil', '450ml beef stock', '230ml water', '1/2 bottle ale', '1 beef stock cube', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '60ml your favourite ale', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'readymade puff pastry']
